hero.title:
Create small digital
tools and toys

section1.name: HACO & KEBU
section1.description: is an abbreviation of 'Have Conviction and Keep Building'. We keep building without wavering.

section2.description: Currently, we are a team of one. We will maintain a small size going forward, and engage in activities that allow a small group to have almost limitless freedom.

section3.description1: We welcome various forms of collaboration including side projects, campaigns, and interviews.
section3.description2: If you send an email to {email}, we will respond within 3 business days.
section3.description3: For project requests, please click the button below to fill out the form. We recommend this for faster and more accurate responses.
section3.note: For price comparisons, please include your request, estimated budget or 1% of project value, or minimum expected quality standards. We will not respond to inquiries without these details.
